get.summary: Fetch a changelog and parse into JSON
get.description: Parse a remote CHANGELOG.MD file and return the formatted document as a JSON document

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Provide any HTTP url from which to fetch the CHANGELOG.md document.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: If true, the source will be pulled fresh rather than requested from the cache.

parameters.name: latest
parameters.description: If true, only the latest entry in the changelog will be returned.

200.description: An object whose fields are release numbers in #.#.# format and values are `Changelog` objects defined in this document.

404.description: The changelog file specified in the source url was not found.

500.description: Failed to parse the changelog document. An empty response is expected.

date.description: The date that this Entry was made in `yyyy-mm-dd` format.

items.description: Structured object containing the details of the changes made in this Entry.

added.description: A list of all things added in this Entry.

changed.description: A list of all things changed in this Entry.

removed.description: A list of all things removed in this Entry.

Entry.description: Each entry represents a single release in a changelog at a specific date in time. Entries have a date and item object representing arrays of the things added, changed, and removed in the given release.
